post:
We've made our popular VPS plans even better with new revised pricing, Bonus BANDWIDTH, 20% OFF your first invoice and great payment options that provide up to an additional 20% discount!

Coupon: '20VUMA'

Site: http://www.crucialp.com/virtual-dedicated-servers-vds/index.php

Quick Facts:

Prices: Plans start from as little as $10/month

Location: These plans are based out of the Colo4Dallas datacenter in Dallas, Texas, United Sates.

Operating Systems Supported (64bit!):
* CentOS 5
* Debian 4
* Ubuntu 8
* Fedora Core 9
* Gentoo 2008

Servers: Only the best will do, don’t settle for single CPU's and RAID 1, host with confidence, host with Crucial.

*2 x Intel Xeon 5420 (8 x 2.5Ghz Cores, 24MB Cache)
*32GB FB-DIMM DDR2 RAM
*8+ Drives RAID 10
*Dual Redundant Power Supplies

Discounts:

* Monthly - 0%
* Quarterly - 5%
* Semi-Annually - 10%
* Annually - 15%
* Bi-Annually - 20%
